# Setup

# Practical

## Setup Project

1. Open your RStudio

2. Create Project
  - File -> New Project...
  - New Directory -> New Project
    - set Directory Name, e.g., `Sesi 4 NHMS`
    - ensure the project directory is in default working directory, i.e., `~/Documents/RStudio`
    - click `Create Project` button
